name: Kai
descriptions: Kai is a Pitt slave who lives in the Pitt in the year 2277.

The slightly depressed and illiterate Kai has taken on the role of cook, supplying the other Pitt slaves with slop, a meal that mostly consists of trog meat and irradiated water from the nearby river.

Beyond supplying the Lone Wanderer with slop, she can also inform them as to the whereabouts of Marco, who she knows to be in the Mill when he is not coming to her for meals. Regardless of the Lone Wanderer's actions, Kai will be killed during the uprising.
Kai appears only in the Fallout 3 add-on The Pitt.

topics.topic_text: What are you doing? Shouldn't you be working?
topics.response_text: I am working. You must be new here.
Sure. Whatever. Let me know if you need some food.
I'm not sure if this stuff will kill you faster than starvation or not.
It's your funeral. Here you go.

topics.topic_text: I need a weapon. Where can I find Marco?
topics.response_text: He's over in the Mill. I don't see him except for meals.
